BODY.p: We announced 6 weeks ago that Google accepted ScummVM for the Google Summer of Code this year again.
We now know how many students Google assigned to us: 4 students will work with us this summer!
In order to tease you a bit, here is a short introduction:

ul.li: RichieSams will work on integrating Marisa Chan's Z-Engine, which concerns Zork Nemesis and Zork Grand Inquisitor.
Rundfunk will focus on GUI extensions and improvement, with particular care for touchscreen devices.
Uruk will port from Pascal to C++ the Avalanche engine, which concerns Lord Avalot d'Argent.
T0by will work on our Wintermute engine and will fix several issues and add several features not present in WME light

BODY.p: We'd like you to join us and warmly welcome to those four students and wish them all the best for the next 3 months.
We also are really grateful to Google to give us again the opportunity to mentor students this year and benefit their passion!
